pages.text: $(li)Cachalot Whales are neutral, massive mammals creatures found in the Lukewarm, Cold and Deep oceans.$(br)$(li)They detect their preys, Squids sending out a moaning noise to echolocate them.
$(li)During thunderstoms, Cachalot Whales may spawn washed up on beaches.
$(li)If you pushed back into the water without hurt them, they may reward you with an Ambergris.
$(li)During thunderstoms, Cachalot Whales may spawn washed up on beaches.$(br)$(li)If you pushed back into the water without hurt them, they may reward you with an Ambergris.
